description.text: there is a bathtub
there is a bathtub on the left
there is a bathtub on the left
there is a sink
there is a sink to the right of the bathtub
there is a sink to the right of the bathtub with mirror above it
there is a washing machine
there is a washing machine in the near right corner
there is a washing machine in the near right corner, located with a door to the bathtub, and a heated towel rail above it
there is a locker
there is a locker above the washing machine
there is a locker above the washing machine, hanging on the near wall
there is a computer desk
there is a computer desk in the far left corner
there is a computer desk in the far left corner, with a painting hanging above it
there is a computer chair

there is a computer chair in front of the desk
there is a bookcase
there is a bookcase opposite the computer desk
there is a bookcase opposite the computer desk, located along the right wall, with a clock hanging next to it
there is a wardrobe with clothes
there is a large wardrobe with clothes in the left corner, next to the near wall
there is a large wardrobe with clothes in the left corner, next to the near wall, located with a door to the computer desk
There is a bed
there is a double bed between a wardrobe with clothes and a computer table
there is a double bed between a wardrobe with clothes and a computer table across the room, in the center of the left wall, opposite it, on the right wall, there is a painting
there is a sofa
there is a corner sofa in the far right corner
there is a corner sofa in the far right corner, facing the left wall, with a painting hanging above it
There are two bookcases

there are two bookcases opposite the sofa, facing the sofa
there is a table under the TV
there is a TV table between two bookcases
there is a table for a TV between two bookcases, there is a TV on the table, and a clock hangs above the TV
There are three closets with clothes
